We produce and distribute specialty 
ingredients made from our molecules for use 
in over 20,000 products from the world’s 
leading brands in the large addressable 
markets of Clean Beauty, Health & Wellness 
and Flavors & Fragrances, reaching more than 
300 million consumers globally. We are also 
developing our own portfolio of products in 
our growing family of consumer brands.

Amyris is focused on minimizing the environmental impact 
of our operations through a variety of initiatives including 
energy efficiency programs, carbon offsets, water and chemical 
management systems and waste recycling programs. In addition, 
our clean manufacturing process, which is highly scalable, allows 
us to produce better performing ingredients at lower cost and 
with far less impact on the environment.
